CustomField.defaultValue: CASE( MOD(today() - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, today() +12, 1, today() +14, 2, today() +14, 3, today() +14, 4, today() +14, 5, today() +14, 6, today() +13, today())
CustomField.description: Date field associated with requested due date.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Date associated with requested due date.
CustomField.label: Requested Due Date
